title: India’s CBSE postpones class 10 and 12 board exams in Middle East; New dates to be announced
summary_full: CBSE has postponed Class 10 and 12 board exams scheduled for March 2, 2026, in several Middle Eastern nations due to escalating geopolitical tensions. The decision prioritizes student and staff safety amidst regional instability, with new dates to be announced after a review on March 3. The board also debunked a fake circular claiming permanent cancellation of exams.
